title: AI-Powered Phishing Detector
description: AI-powered phishing detection system using MachineLearning & Natural Language Processing

title: Cowrie Honeypot with NGrok
description: This project deploys the Cowrie SSH honeypot into a VirtualBox VM, using Ubuntu, in order to receive real-life brute-force attack attempts on external IP addresses.

title: Network Intrusion Detection System Lab
description: A practical Ubuntu 20.04 lab that deploys Suricata, Zeek and Filebeat to give students and blue-teamers a live, GUI-based sandbox for learning network-security monitoring.

title: Password Strength Checker
description: A sleek, user-friendly Python application built with Tkinter that evaluates password strength using real-time analysis and cryptographic standards.

title: Python Network Packet Sniffer
description: Automated AWS security configuration auditor. Checks for misconfigurations and compliance violations.

title: Electronic Voting System using Blockchain
description: An Electronic voting system using Blockchain for my university final year project.
